channel.title: Frontend on herenow
channel.description: Recent content in Frontend on herenow

item.title: Moving Assets from Sprockets to Brunch
item.description: Considerations First of all, this is not a complete migration to Brunch, we are only moving our javascript to Brunch, all other assets, such as stylsheets, images and fonts may will remain in Rails’ regular asset pipeline. I don’t think there are any benefit of moving them to Brunch. We will also still need Sprockets to digest and build our assets manifest. Why Brunch If you are reading this article, you are probably already interested in brunch.
